value.0: Any true follower of the Lady of Mysteries would have no part in... that cult. If you intend to trade with me, fine; otherwise you can take your insinuations elsewhere.
Since its founding, yes, and I still do devote myself to the Lady of Mysteries. Did you wish to see my wares?

Oh yes, very few have brought me essence from the Phane, but it is something I am familiar with. I could take a small portion of the essence and use it to enchant a piece of your equipment to better protect against such abominations, in exchange for the remainder of the essence?

<StartHighlight>[((Completing this quest you will be able to choose one of your currently equipped items to permanently add 5/- Divine Damage Resistance to.))]</Start>

What would you like me to enchant for you then?

<StartHighlight>[((Note that this bonus will count towards the maximum power slots for the Mythal Crafting System. If you intend to alter this item with the MCS, you should do so before completing the quest. This bonus will NOT stack with existing Divine damage resistance.))]</Start>
Are you sure you want your Main Weapon enchanted? Once the essence is used, it can't be undone.
Are you sure you want your Shield or Second Weapon enchanted? Once the essence is used, it can't be undone.
Are you sure you want your Second Ring enchanted? Once the essence is used, it can't be undone.
Are you sure you want your First Ring enchanted? Once the essence is used, it can't be undone.
Are you sure you want your Helm enchanted? Once the essence is used, it can't be undone.
Are you sure you want your Cloak enchanted? Once the essence is used, it can't be undone.
Are you sure you want your Bracers or Gloves enchanted? Once the essence is used, it can't be undone.
Are you sure you want your Boots enchanted? Once the essence is used, it can't be undone.
Are you sure you want your Belt enchanted? Once the essence is used, it can't be undone.
Are you sure you want your Armor enchanted? Once the essence is used, it can't be undone.
Are you sure you want your Amulet enchanted? Once the essence is used, it can't be undone.
<StartAction>[*the old mage takes the day to complete the enchanting work while you idle in town*]</Start>
Indeed. May it guard you from harm against such beasts that you encounter in the future... or the past as the case may be.
I am Belorfin, wizard of the Monolith -- or rather, former wizard of the Monolith.
Indeed. In this case, an explanation is better served by venturing to the site of the Monolith to see for yourself.
You're one of those Mystrans, aren't you? Rumor says they're responsible for the Arcanum cult.
If that is how you're going to be, you can just freeze here then.
Fine, nevermind... do you know what to do with this, or not? <StartAction>[*show him the Temporal Essence from the Phane*]</Start>
You used to serve at the Monolith? Did you worship Mystra?

Actually I had heard rumor that the first band of adventurers who encountered the Phane were charged to see to its destruction by Mystra herself. Might you know what could be done with its essence? <StartAction>[*show him the Temporal Essence from the Phane*]</Start>
Actually, on second thought, I think I'll save the essence for later, now that I know where to find you.
Whatever, I still don't trust you mage.
Take care Belorfin, and thank you.
Greetings. May I see your arcane supplies?
